scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:assets && npm run build:html && npm run build:less
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:less
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && npm run assemble:html && npm run rename:html
scripts.assemble:html: assemble bio:html blog:html contact:html home:html performing:html student-opportunities:html studio-policies:html suzuki-method:html teaching-philosophy:html why-private-lessons:html
scripts.watch:html: npm run watch:templates:html & npm run watch:home:html & npm run watch:about:html & npm run watch:teaching-pages:html & npm run watch:performing:html & npm run watch:blog:html & npm run watch:contact:html
scripts.build:less: npm run build:home:less && npm run build:about:less
scripts.watch:less: npm run watch:templates:less & npm run watch:home:less & npm run watch:about:less
scripts.build:home: npm run build:home:html && npm run build:home:less
scripts.watch:home: npm run watch:home:html & npm run watch:home:less
scripts.build:home:html: npm run clean:home:html && assemble home:html && npm run rename:home:html
scripts.//: --- Tasks for pages in the 'About Me' section ---
scripts.build:about:html: npm run build:bio:html && npm run build:teaching-philosophy:html
scripts.watch:about:html: npm run watch:bio:html & npm run watch:teaching-philosophy:html
scripts.build:bio: rm public/bio/* && npm run build:bio:html && npm run build:bio:less
scripts.watch:bio: npm run watch:bio:html & npm run watch:bio:less
scripts.build:bio:html: npm run clean:bio:html && assemble bio:html && npm run rename:bio:html
scripts.//: ---Tasks for the pages in the 'Teaching' section ---
scripts.build:teaching-pages:html: npm run build:why-private-lessons:html && npm run build:student-opportunities:html && npm run build:studio-policies:html && npm run build:suzuki-method:html
scripts.watch:teaching-pages:html: npm run watch:why-private-lessons:html & npm run watch:student-opportunities:html & npm run watch:studio-policies:html & npm run watch:suzuki-method:html
